title: The Convergence of Intelligence: How AI is Redefining the Modern Business Landscape
description: In the current era of rapid digital transformation, the intersection of Technology and Business has reached a critical inflection point. No longer are these two entities operating in silos; instead, they have merged into a singular, cohesive engine of growth. At the heart of this evolution is Artificial Intelligence (AI), a force that is not only optimizing internal operations but also fundamentally altering the way Digital Marketing connects brands with their audiences. As we navigate 2026, the adoption of intelligent systems is no longer a competitive advantage—it is a baseline requirement for survival in a globalized economy.

title: Nexus Analyst and the Automation Debate in Retail Trading
description: Speed is no longer the competitive edge in trading. Algorithms have already won that race. The real issue now is control. Systems such as Nexus Analyst, developed within the Nexus AI ecosystem, sit at the center of a growing debate about how much execution authority investors should delegate to artificial intelligence. title: Some US investors pivot to infrastructure amid broader AI selloff
description: As Wall Street's love affair with artificial intelligence heavyweights cools, some investors are pivoting to infrastructure companies they expect to benefit from AI capital spending, a shift that is spawning a slew of new products.

title: Chip startup Taalas raises $169 million to help build AI chips to take on Nvidia

title: Global Leaders Unite for AI Future at India AI Impact Summit
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi engaged with global CEOs to discuss scaling artificial intelligence responsibly at the India AI Impact Summit. Emphasizing global collaboration, the summit highlighted opportunities for growth and sustainable development. Modi underscored the commitment to harness AI for human progress, inaugurated the event, and shared insights from the day.
content: In a significant gathering at the India AI Impact Summit, Prime Minister Narendra Modi met with prominent global CEOs to delve into the potential of artificial intelligence. The discussions centered around scaling AI in a responsible manner and foste... [528 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence Boost: Andhra Pradesh's Leap into the Future
description: Andhra Pradesh's Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu attends the AI Impact Summit in Delhi to sign agreements with major corporations and academic institutions. The focus is on advancing AI infrastructure, skill development, and collaborations, including partnerships with IBM, UNICC, IIT Madras, and others to enhance AI education and applications.

title: Global Diplomacy: Strengthening Ties and Strategic Partnerships
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi held bilateral meetings with leaders from Greece, Switzerland, the Netherlands, and UAE to enhance trade, investment, and technological collaboration. The discussions emphasized deepening ties in sectors such as artificial intelligence, defence, and clean energy, alongside reinforcing global alliances to address international challenges.

title: Infosys cofounder Nandan Nilekani bats for ‘diffusion of AI’; shares example of PM Modi’s vision on applying tech to agriculture and dairy
description: Tech News News: Nandan Nilekani, the co-founder of Infosys, has a message for the world: India is about to do for Artificial Intelligence (AI) what it did for digital.
